Class WysiwymLabel

java.lang.Object
  FocusWidget
      liber.browse.client.WysiwymLabel

public class WysiwymLabel
extends FocusWidget

A label that, if clicked, opens a popup menu

Version:
1.0 December 6, 2006
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

Nested Class Summary
 class WysiwymLabel.LabelListener
          Attempt to implement version of WYSIWYM that does not require the mouse; user should be able to hop from anchor to anchor with the tab key, and open a menu using the space bar.
 
Constructor Summary

          Constructs a FocusWidget with the given label and anchor, to add to the WYSIWYM feedback text
